content: That sounds like a great plan! Starting with a Roth IRA is a good choice, especially if you believe that you'll be in a higher tax bracket in retirement than you are now. It can also be helpful to set specific savings goals for each year and to automate your contributions, so you don't forget to save or miss out on any potential tax benefits. Remember, it's important to continue educating yourself about all aspects of retirement savings, including tax laws, investment strategies, and financial planning. With time, dedication, and a steady savings plan, you can help secure your financial future and enjoy a comfortable retirement.
